name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Data Engineer with a strong foundation in data analysis and problem-solving, leveraging 10+ years of experience to drive impactful solutions in complex environments. Skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**, with hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, delivering high-performance software solutions. Proficient in developing scalable data pipelines and APIs using **cloud-native architectures** on **Azure** and **AWS**, ensuring high data quality and system reliability.
Demonstrated experience in mastering digital oilfield technologies and drilling engineering principles, alongside a solid understanding of Earth Sciences and geology. Strong commitment to adherence in HSE protocols and compliance standards, including QA and IT skills. Passionate about implementing innovative solutions that enhance operational efficiency and maximize data value.
